{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3727299,"name":"Murilo Miranda Santos","username":"murilo404","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/m/49beb7/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-08-31T19:58:08.264Z","cooked":"

Good morning everyone! My FRC team is aiming to put our Swerve in closed loop. We managed to do that, but we’re still uncomfortable with the way we did it. From this point on, we want the Chief Delphi audience to help us improve.

github.com

GitHub - muriloMiranda404/closed-loop-test

Contribute to muriloMiranda404/closed-loop-test development by creating an account on GitHub.

Please, if you look at the code and see anything that’s even slightly wrong or could be improved, don’t hesitate to reply to this thread! This project was also created to use the SwerveDrivePoseEstimator, so your contribution to the code is welcome. We appreciate your help!
